name: District Thirteen
description:
In the near future, a young agent is caught in the conflict between the corporation/owner of the city and the resistance hidden beneath the city surface.

Explore District Thirteen, the center of the conflict, and uncover its little secrets.

Different choices lead to different endings.

This is is a submission for the 7th RPG Maker RTP Game Jam

Assets are default RTP with some edits and recolors made by me.

Credits
- Made by Ted Latas
- Rpg Maker MV
- Yanfly - Yanfly Engine Plugins
- Terrax - Terrax Lights Plugin
